problem_text_cn: 某种冰淇淋纸筒为圆锥形,其底面半径为3cm,母线长为8cm,若不计加工余料,则制作这种纸筒所需纸片的面积为()
problem_text_en: A certain ice cream paper tube is cone-shaped, its bottom radius is N_0, and the length of the generatrix is N_1. If the processing residual material is not included, the area of ​​the paper sheet required to make this paper tube is ()
raw_answer: 解:底面半径为3cm,则底面周长=6πcm,侧面面积=\frac{1}{2}×6π×8=24πcm^{2}．故选:A．
